blocks.name: chf
blocks.content: The constant ` Hf ` is a class.

blocks.name: df-hf
blocks.content: Define the hereditarily finite sets. These are the finite sets whose elements are finite, and so forth. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: elhf
blocks.content: Membership in the hereditarily finite sets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elhf(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, chf), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, chf), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, com))))
  eleq2i(c0, chf, cuni(cima(cr1, com)))
  df-hf()
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, com))), wrex(s0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(s0))))), wf1(cr1, con0, universe), wfun(cr1))
  r111()
  f1fun(cr1, con0, universe)
  eluniima(s0, cr1, c0, com)
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elhf(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Hf ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ Hf, ∃(s0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` s0)), c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " _om))
  eleq2i(c0, chf, ⋃(R1 " _om))
  df-hf()
  mp2b((c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " _om)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` s0))), (R1 : On ↣ 𝕌), Fun(R1))
  r111()
  f1fun(cr1, con0, universe)
  eluniima(s0, cr1, c0, com)
  diff.cr1.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elhf2
blocks.content: Alternate form of membership in the hereditarily finite sets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elhf2(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))))
  elhf(hs0, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com)), wo(wcel(com, con0), wceq(com, con0)))
  omon()
  jaoi(wcel(com, con0), wceq(com, con0), wb(wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com)))
  impbid(wcel(com, con0), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  rexlimdva(hs0, com, wcel(com, con0), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(com, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com)), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0)))
  adantl(wcel(com, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  nnon(cv(hs0))
  rankr1a(cv(hs0), c0)
  adantl(wcel(com, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), com), wi(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  elnn(cfv(crnk, c0), cv(hs0))
  expcom(wcel(com, con0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0)), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), com), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  adantr(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), com))
  peano2(cfv(crnk, c0))
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cpw(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0)), wcel(c0, cpw(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)))), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0))))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0)), wss(c0, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  r1rankid(c0, universe)
  elpw(c0, cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(com, con0), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cpw(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  syl(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), cpw(cfv(cr1, cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0))
  nnon(cfv(crnk, c0))
  r1suc(cfv(crnk, c0))
  rspcev(hs0, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), cr1)
  mpbiri(wceq(com, con0), wb(wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com)), wb(wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0)))
  2th(wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0))
  tz9.13(hs0, c0)
  rankon(c0)
  bibi12d(wceq(com, con0), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wrex(hs0, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), con0))
  rexeq(hs0, com, con0, wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2(com, con0, cfv(crnk, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(com, con0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  diff.hs0.c(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cr1, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elhf2(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Hf ↔(rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈ _om, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)))
  elhf(hs0, c0)
  ax-mp((∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))↔(rank ` c0)∈ _om), (_om ∈ On ∨ _om = On))
  omon()
  jaoi(_om ∈ On, _om = On, (∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))↔(rank ` c0)∈ _om))
  impbid(_om ∈ On, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  rexlimdva(hs0, com, _om ∈ On, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0), (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  sylbid((_om ∈ On ∧ hs0 ∈ _om), c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0), (rank ` c0)∈ _om, (rank ` c0)∈ hs0)
  adantl(_om ∈ On, hs0 ∈ _om, (c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)↔(rank ` c0)∈ hs0))
  syl(hs0 ∈ _om, (c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)↔(rank ` c0)∈ hs0), hs0 ∈ On)
  nnon(hs0)
  rankr1a(hs0, c0)
  adantl(_om ∈ On, hs0 ∈ _om, ((rank ` c0)∈ hs0 →(rank ` c0)∈ _om))
  expcom(hs0 ∈ _om, (rank ` c0)∈ hs0, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  elnn((rank ` c0), hs0)
  expcom(_om ∈ On, (rank ` c0)∈ _om, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)))
  syl2anc(((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On), ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), suc((rank ` c0))∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  adantr((rank ` c0)∈ _om, _om ∈ On, suc((rank ` c0))∈ _om)
  peano2((rank ` c0))
  eleqtrrd(c0, (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))), P((R1 `(rank ` c0))), ((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On))
  sylibr(((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On), c0 ∈ P((R1 `(rank ` c0))), c0 ⊆(R1 `(rank ` c0)))
  mp1i(((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧ _om ∈ On), c0 ⊆(R1 `(rank ` c0)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  r1rankid(c0, universe)
  elpw(c0, (R1 `(rank ` c0)))
  adantr((rank ` c0)∈ _om, _om ∈ On, (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))= P((R1 `(rank ` c0))))
  syl((rank ` c0)∈ _om, (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0)))= P((R1 `(rank ` c0))), (rank ` c0)∈ On)
  nnon((rank ` c0))
  r1suc((rank ` c0))
  rspcev(hs0, suc((rank ` c0)), com, c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))), c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  eleq2d(c0, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))), hs0 = suc((rank ` c0)))
  fveq2(hs0, suc((rank ` c0)), cr1)
  mpbiri(_om = On, (∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))↔(rank ` c0)∈ _om), (∃(hs0 ∈ On, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))↔(rank ` c0)∈ On))
  2th(∃(hs0 ∈ On, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (rank ` c0)∈ On)
  tz9.13(hs0, c0)
  rankon(c0)
  bibi12d(_om = On, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (rank ` c0)∈ _om, ∃(hs0 ∈ On, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0)), (rank ` c0)∈ On)
  rexeq(hs0, com, con0, c0 ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  eleq2(com, con0, (rank ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(_om ∈ On)
  diff.hs0.w((rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  diff.hs0.c(suc((rank ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(R1 ` suc((rank ` c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
}

blocks.name: elhf2g
blocks.content: Hereditarily finiteness via rank. Closed form of ~ elhf2 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: 0hf
blocks.content: The empty set is a hereditarily finite set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0hf() {
  |- wcel(emptycls, chf)
} = {
  mpbir(wcel(emptycls, chf), wrex(hs0, com, wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))))
  mp2an(wrex(hs0, com, wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(csuc(emptycls), com), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls))))
  ax-mp(wcel(csuc(emptycls), com), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  peano2(emptycls)
  eleqtrri(emptycls, cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls)), cpw(cfv(cr1, emptycls)))
  0elpw(cfv(cr1, emptycls))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls)), cpw(cfv(cr1, emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  0elon()
  r1suc(emptycls)
  rspcev(hs0, csuc(emptycls), com, wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2d(emptycls, cfv(cr1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(emptycls)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(emptycls), cr1)
  elhf(hs0, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(csuc(emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls))))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0hf() {
  ⊢ ∅ ∈ Hf
} = {
  mpbir(∅ ∈ Hf, ∃(hs0 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈(R1 ` hs0)))
  mp2an(∃(hs0 ∈ _om, ∅ ∈(R1 ` hs0)), suc(∅)∈ _om, ∅ ∈(R1 ` suc(∅)))
  ax-mp(suc(∅)∈ _om, ∅ ∈ _om)
  peano1()
  peano2(emptycls)
  eleqtrri(emptycls, (R1 ` suc(∅)), P((R1 ` ∅)))
  0elpw((R1 ` ∅))
  ax-mp((R1 ` suc(∅))= P((R1 ` ∅)), ∅ ∈ On)
  0elon()
  r1suc(emptycls)
  rspcev(hs0, suc(∅), com, ∅ ∈(R1 ` suc(∅)), ∅ ∈(R1 ` hs0))
  eleq2d(emptycls, (R1 ` hs0), (R1 ` suc(∅)), hs0 = suc(∅))
  fveq2(hs0, suc(∅), cr1)
  elhf(hs0, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(suc(∅))
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(∅ ∈(R1 ` suc(∅)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}

blocks.name: hfun
blocks.content: The union of two HF sets is an HF set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), chf))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c1)), com))
  eqeltrd(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c1)), com, cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)))
  rankung(c0, chf, c1, chf)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf), wcel(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com))
  ibi(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  ibi(wcel(c1, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com))
  elhf2g(c1, chf)
  mpjaod(wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com)), wcel(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), cfv(crnk, c1)), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com), wi(wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com)))
  eleq1a(cfv(crnk, c1), com, cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com), wi(wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com)))
  biimprcd(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com))
  eleq1d(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), com, cfv(crnk, c0), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  biimpi(wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  eqeq1i(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  uncom(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com)), wo(wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), cfv(crnk, c1)), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0))), wo(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com), wo(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0))), word(cfv(crnk, c0)), word(cfv(crnk, c1)))
  nnord(cfv(crnk, c0))
  nnord(cfv(crnk, c1))
  ordtri2or2(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))
  orbi12i(wss(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wss(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), cfv(crnk, c1)), wceq(cun(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  ssequn1(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))
  ssequn1(cfv(crnk, c1), cfv(crnk, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wb(wcel(cun(c0, c1), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c1)), com)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), universe))
  unexg(c0, chf, c1, chf)
  elhf2g(cun(c0, c1), universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfun(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf)→(c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Hf)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Hf, (rank `(c0 ⋃ c1))∈ _om)
  eqeltrd((rank `(c0 ⋃ c1)), com, ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)), (c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf))
  rankung(c0, chf, c1, chf)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Hf, c1 ∈ Hf, ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ _om, (rank ` c0)∈ _om, (rank ` c1)∈ _om)
  ibi(c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  ibi(c1 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c1)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(c1, chf)
  mpjaod(((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧(rank ` c1)∈ _om), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ _om, ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))=(rank ` c1), ((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0))
  adantl((rank ` c0)∈ _om, (rank ` c1)∈ _om, (((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))=(rank ` c1)→((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ _om))
  eleq1a((rank ` c1), com, ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))
  adantr((rank ` c0)∈ _om, (rank ` c1)∈ _om, (((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0)→((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ _om))
  biimprcd((rank ` c0)∈ _om, ((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))∈ _om)
  eleq1d(((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)), com, (rank ` c0), ((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0))
  biimpi(((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))=(rank ` c0))
  eqeq1i(((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0)), (rank ` c0), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1)))
  uncom((rank ` c1), (rank ` c0))
  sylib(((rank ` c0)∈ _om ∧(rank ` c1)∈ _om), (((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))=(rank ` c1)∨((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0)), ((rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c1)∨(rank ` c1)⊆(rank ` c0)))
  syl2an((rank ` c0)∈ _om, (rank ` c1)∈ _om, ((rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c1)∨(rank ` c1)⊆(rank ` c0)), Ord((rank ` c0)), Ord((rank ` c1)))
  nnord((rank ` c0))
  nnord((rank ` c1))
  ordtri2or2((rank ` c0), (rank ` c1))
  orbi12i((rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c1), (rank ` c1)⊆(rank ` c0), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c1))=(rank ` c1), ((rank ` c1)⋃(rank ` c0))=(rank ` c0))
  ssequn1((rank ` c0), (rank ` c1))
  ssequn1((rank ` c1), (rank ` c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), ((c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Hf ↔(rank `(c0 ⋃ c1))∈ _om), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ 𝕌)
  unexg(c0, chf, c1, chf)
  elhf2g((c0 ⋃ c1), universe)
}

blocks.name: hfsn
blocks.content: The singleton of an HF set is an HF set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: hfadj
blocks.content: Adjoining one HF element to an HF set preserves HF status. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: hfelhf
blocks.content: Any member of an HF set is itself an HF set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfelhf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, chf)), wcel(c0, chf))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, chf)), wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
  rankelg(c1, chf, c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, chf), wi(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c0, chf)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com))
  ibi(wcel(c1, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com))
  elhf2g(c1, chf)
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com), wi(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c0, chf)))
  expcomd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(c0, chf))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c1), com)), wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  elnn(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))
  elhf2g(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfelhf(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Hf)→ c0 ∈ Hf)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1))
  rankelg(c1, chf, c0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈ Hf, ((rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1)→ c0 ∈ Hf), (rank ` c1)∈ _om)
  ibi(c1 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c1)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(c1, chf)
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, (rank ` c1)∈ _om, ((rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1)→ c0 ∈ Hf))
  expcomd(c0 ∈ c1, (rank ` c1)∈ _om, (rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1), c0 ∈ Hf)
  syl5ibr(c0 ∈ c1, ((rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1)∧(rank ` c1)∈ _om), c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  elnn((rank ` c0), (rank ` c1))
  elhf2g(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: hftr
blocks.content: The class of all hereditarily finite sets is transitive. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: hfext
blocks.content: Extensionality for HF sets depends only on comparison of HF elements. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfext(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, chf, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, chf, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wral(s0, chf, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cdif(universe, chf), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  biantrud(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wral(s0, chf, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cdif(universe, chf), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cdif(universe, chf), wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  sylan2b(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(universe, chf)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), chf)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(universe, chf)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), chf)), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  eldif(cv(s0), universe, chf)
  2falsed(wa(wa(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), chf))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf), wn(wcel(cv(s0), chf)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  stoic1b(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cv(s0), chf), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  hfelhf(cv(s0), c0)
  adantll(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf), wn(wcel(cv(s0), chf)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  stoic1b(wcel(c1, chf), wcel(cv(s0), chf), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  hfelhf(cv(s0), c1)
  3bitri(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wral(s0, chf, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cdif(universe, chf), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cun(chf, cdif(universe, chf)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  dfcleq(s0, c0, c1)
  bitr2i(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, cun(chf, cdif(universe, chf)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, universe, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  raleqi(s0, cun(chf, cdif(universe, chf)), universe, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  unvdif(chf)
  ralv(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  ralunb(s0, chf, cdif(universe, chf), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, chf), wcel(c1, chf))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, chf)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, chf)
  diff.cun.s(s0, chf, cdif(universe, chf))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, chf)
  diff.chf.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfext(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf)→(c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ Hf,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6rbbr((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), c0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ Hf,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)), (∀(s0 ∈ Hf,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈(𝕌 \ Hf),(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))))
  biantrud((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), ∀(s0 ∈ Hf,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈(𝕌 \ Hf),(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ralrimiva(s0, (𝕌 \ Hf), (c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))
  sylan2b((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf), s0 ∈(𝕌 \ Hf), (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1), ¬ s0 ∈ Hf)
  mpbiran(s0 ∈(𝕌 \ Hf), ¬ s0 ∈ Hf, s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  eldif(s0, universe, chf)
  2falsed(((c0 ∈ Hf ∧ c1 ∈ Hf)∧ ¬ s0 ∈ Hf), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ Hf, c1 ∈ Hf, ¬ s0 ∈ Hf, ¬ s0 ∈ c0)
  stoic1b(c0 ∈ Hf, s0 ∈ Hf, s0 ∈ c0)
  hfelhf(s0, c0)
  adantll(c0 ∈ Hf, c1 ∈ Hf, ¬ s0 ∈ Hf, ¬ s0 ∈ c1)
  stoic1b(c1 ∈ Hf, s0 ∈ Hf, s0 ∈ c1)
  hfelhf(s0, c1)
  3bitri(c0 = c1, (∀(s0 ∈ Hf,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈(𝕌 \ Hf),(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈(Hf ⋃(𝕌 \ Hf)),(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)))
  dfcleq(s0, c0, c1)
  bitr2i(∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈(Hf ⋃(𝕌 \ Hf)),(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ 𝕌,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1)))
  raleqi(s0, (Hf ⋃(𝕌 \ Hf)), universe, (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))
  unvdif(chf)
  ralv(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))
  ralunb(s0, chf, (𝕌 \ Hf), (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈ c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Hf, c1 ∈ Hf)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, chf)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, chf)
  diff.cun.s(s0, chf, (𝕌 \ Hf))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, chf)
  diff.chf.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: hfuni
blocks.content: The union of an HF set is itself hereditarily finite. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfuni(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cuni(c0), chf))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cuni(c0), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), com))
  syl5eqel(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), com, cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c0, chf))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), com), wss(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  mpbi(wss(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wtr(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  ontrci(cfv(crnk, c0))
  rankon(c0)
  df-tr(cfv(crnk, c0))
  ibi(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  mp2an(wi(wa(wss(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com)), wcel(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), com)), word(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0))), word(com))
  onordi(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)))
  eqeltrri(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), con0, cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)))
  rankuni(c0)
  rankon(cuni(c0))
  ordom()
  ordtr2(cuni(cfv(crnk, c0)), com, cfv(crnk, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, chf), wb(wcel(cuni(c0), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cuni(c0)), com)), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, chf)
  elhf2g(cuni(c0), universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfuni(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Hf → ⋃ c0 ∈ Hf)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ Hf, ⋃ c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` ⋃ c0)∈ _om)
  syl5eqel((rank ` ⋃ c0), com, ⋃(rank ` c0), c0 ∈ Hf)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ Hf, ⋃(rank ` c0)∈ _om, ⋃(rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c0), (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  mpbi(⋃(rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c0), Tr((rank ` c0)))
  ontrci((rank ` c0))
  rankon(c0)
  df-tr((rank ` c0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  mp2an(((⋃(rank ` c0)⊆(rank ` c0)∧(rank ` c0)∈ _om)→ ⋃(rank ` c0)∈ _om), Ord(⋃(rank ` c0)), Ord(_om))
  onordi(⋃(rank ` c0))
  eqeltrri(⋃(rank ` c0), con0, (rank ` ⋃ c0))
  rankuni(c0)
  rankon(⋃ c0)
  ordom()
  ordtr2(⋃(rank ` c0), com, (rank ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ Hf, (⋃ c0 ∈ Hf ↔(rank ` ⋃ c0)∈ _om), ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, chf)
  elhf2g(⋃ c0, universe)
}

blocks.name: hfpw
blocks.content: The power class of an HF set is hereditarily finite. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfpw(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cpw(c0), chf))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cpw(c0), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), com))
  eqeltrd(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), com, csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), wcel(c0, chf))
  rankpwg(c0, chf)
  syl(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), com), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  ibi(wcel(c0, chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), com))
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  peano2(cfv(crnk, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, chf), wb(wcel(cpw(c0), chf), wcel(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), com)), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, chf)
  elhf2g(cpw(c0), universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfpw(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Hf → P(c0)∈ Hf)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ Hf, P(c0)∈ Hf, (rank ` P(c0))∈ _om)
  eqeltrd((rank ` P(c0)), com, suc((rank ` c0)), c0 ∈ Hf)
  rankpwg(c0, chf)
  syl(c0 ∈ Hf, suc((rank ` c0))∈ _om, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  ibi(c0 ∈ Hf, (rank ` c0)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(c0, chf)
  peano2((rank ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ Hf, (P(c0)∈ Hf ↔(rank ` P(c0))∈ _om), P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, chf)
  elhf2g(P(c0), universe)
}

blocks.name: hfninf
blocks.content: ` _om ` is not hereditarily finite. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hfninf() {
  |- wn(wcel(com, chf))
} = {
  ax-mp(wn(wcel(com, chf)), wi(wcel(com, chf), wn(wcel(com, chf))))
  mtbiri(wcel(com, chf), wcel(com, chf), wcel(com, com))
  elirr(com)
  bitrd(wcel(com, chf), wcel(com, chf), wcel(com, com), wcel(cfv(crnk, com), com))
  elhf2g(com, chf)
  eleq1d(cfv(crnk, com), com, com, wcel(com, chf))
  sylib(wcel(com, chf), wceq(cfv(crnk, com), com), wcel(com, con0))
  mpbiri(wcel(com, chf), wcel(com, con0), word(com))
  ordom()
  elong(com, chf)
  bitr3i(wcel(com, con0), wceq(cfv(crnk, com), com), wcel(com, cdm(cr1)))
  eleq2i(com, cdm(cr1), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wf1(cr1, con0, universe))
  r111()
  f1dm(cr1, con0, universe)
  rankonid(com)
  pm2.01(wcel(com, chf))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hfninf() {
  ⊢ ¬ _om ∈ Hf
} = {
  ax-mp(¬ _om ∈ Hf, (_om ∈ Hf → ¬ _om ∈ Hf))
  mtbiri(_om ∈ Hf, _om ∈ Hf, _om ∈ _om)
  elirr(com)
  bitrd(_om ∈ Hf, _om ∈ Hf, _om ∈ _om, (rank ` _om)∈ _om)
  elhf2g(com, chf)
  eleq1d((rank ` _om), com, com, _om ∈ Hf)
  sylib(_om ∈ Hf, (rank ` _om)= _om, _om ∈ On)
  mpbiri(_om ∈ Hf, _om ∈ On, Ord(_om))
  ordom()
  elong(com, chf)
  bitr3i(_om ∈ On, (rank ` _om)= _om, _om ∈ dom(R1))
  eleq2i(com, dom(R1), con0)
  ax-mp(dom(R1)= On, (R1 : On ↣ 𝕌))
  r111()
  f1dm(cr1, con0, universe)
  rankonid(com)
  pm2.01(_om ∈ Hf)
}
